activity.text:
@rithviknishad @nihal467 Here are two simple possible solutions

1) We can shift the patient details section to the right side of grid and setting comment perPage limit to 5.

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/73033511/12413c5c-52af-4361-8744-c6c266b1ac87)

2) We can make patient details page expand full width and comments and rest section side by side.

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/73033511/64d9d657-2b5b-445e-a2f9-b4f55f45f0e1)
